name: Remove_n_Disable
author: KF Elahi

sections.description:
This plugin has several options to disable/enable several links from wordpress dashboard, disable browser update warning, wordpress core update etc. This plugin’s option will be found under settings named as R_n_D.

You can modify below options by using this plugin

Features

1) Remove Wp Logo.
2) Remove About Link.
3) Remove Org Link.
4) Remove Documentation Link.
5) Remove support forum Link.
6) Remove Feedback Link.
7) Remove View Site Link.
8) Remove Footer Version.
9) Remove Footer Text.
10) Disable Browser Upgrade Warning.
11) Disable WordPress Update.This plugin has several options to disable/enable several links from wordpress dashboard, disable browser update warning, wordpress core update etc. This plugin’s option will be found under settings named as R_n_D.

You can modify below options by using this plugin

Remove Wp Logo
Remove About Link
Remove Org Link
Remove Documentation Link
Remove support forum Link
Remove Feedback Link
Remove View Site Link
Remove Footer Version
Remove Footer Text
Disable Browser Upgrade Warning
Disable WordPress Update

Plugin Name

Contributors: KF Elahi
Donate link:
Tags: Remove Link, Footer, Disable cor update, wp logo
Requires at least: 3.0
Tested up to: 3.5
Stable tag: 4.3
License: GPL2

A highly customizable plugin that will help to disable many links from dashboard.
sections.installation:
1. Upload remove_n_disable folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. OR search for Top-authors in WP-admin > Plugins > Add New
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  4. Go to Settings > R_n_D and set you own configuration.
  5. Save settings.1. Upload remove_n_disable folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  6. OR search for Top-authors in WP-admin > Plugins > Add New
  7. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  8. Go to Settings > R_n_D and set you own configuration.
  9. Save settings.
